CWEs: CWE-74: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')
CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function does not validate or sanitize the input 'json' which can lead to various vulnerabilities. An attacker can pass malicious data in 'json' to perform code injection or cross-site scripting attacks. Also, the function does not handle the case when 'json' is null or undefined, which can lead to runtime errors.
